title: [1.8+]超级黑洞TNT
txt_content:
这次做了一个小装置（黑洞TNT）说黑洞其实就是把身边的生物吸过来而已







指令
直接复制到指令方块后激活即可/summon FallingSand ~ ~1 ~ {Tile:152,Time:10,Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"fill ~ ~-14 ~1 ~ ~-1 ~1 redstone_block"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"setblock ~2 ~-9 ~6 redstone_block"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/setblock ~3 ~-8 ~9 command_block 0 replace {Command:"/kill @e[type=ArmorStand,name=tnt]"}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/setblock ~1 ~-7 ~9 command_block 0 replace {Command:"/execute @e[type=ArmorStand,name=tnt] ~ ~ ~ /tp @e[type=!Player,r=10] @e[type=ArmorStand,name=tnt]"}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/setblock ~3 ~-6 ~8 command_block 0 replace {Command:"/execute @e[type=ArmorStand,name=tnt] ~ ~ ~ /summon PrimedTnt ~ ~ ~ {Fuse:12}"}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/setblock ~1 ~-5 ~8 command_block 0 replace {Command:"/execute @e[type=ArmorStand,name=tnt] ~ ~ ~ /particle portal ~ ~ ~ 0.6 0.6 0.6 0.6 700 @e[type=ArmorStand,name=tnt] "}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/setblock ~3 ~-4 ~7 command_block 0 replace {Command:"/tp @e[type=Enderman,name=TNT] ~ ~-9999 ~"}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/setblock ~1 ~-3 ~7 command_block 0 replace {Command:"/execute @e[type=Enderman,name=TNT] ~ ~ ~ /summon ArmorStand ~ ~ ~ {Marker:1,CustomName:\\"tnt\\"}"}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/setblock ~3 ~-2 ~6 command_block 0 replace {Command:"fill ~-1 ~0 ~ ~-1 ~ ~4 redstone_block 0"}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/setblock ~1 ~-1 ~6 command_block 0 replace {Command:"fill ~1 ~0 ~ ~1 ~ ~4 stone 0"}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"fill ~ ~ ~5 ~4 ~1 ~11 stained_glass 0"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"fill ~ ~ ~5 ~4 ~ ~11 quartz_block 0"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/setblock ~2 ~3 ~4 wall_sign 1 replace {Text1:"{text:\\"关闭系统\\",bold:True,italic:False,underlined:True,strikethrough:False,color:red,clickEvent:{action:run_command,value:\\"fill ~2 ~-2 ~ ~-2 ~0 ~8 air\\"}}",Text2:"{text:\\"右键关闭系统\\",bold:True,italic:False,underlined:False,strikethrough:False,color:black,clickEvent:{action:run_command,value:\\"fill ~2 ~-2 ~ ~-2 ~0 ~8 air\\"}}",Text3:"{text:\\"右键关闭系统\\",bold:True,italic:False,underlined:False,strikethrough:False,color:black,clickEvent:{action:run_command,value:\\"fill ~2 ~-2 ~ ~-2 ~0 ~8 air\\"}}",Text4:"{text:\\"右键关闭系统\\",bold:True,italic:False,underlined:False,strikethrough:False,color:black,clickEvent:{action:run_command,value:\\"fill ~2 ~-2 ~ ~-2 ~0 ~8 air\\"}}"}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/give @p minecraft:spawn_egg 64 58 {display:{Name:TNT},ench:[]}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"setblock ~ ~-1 ~1 redstone_block"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"fill ~ ~ ~ ~ ~18 ~1 air"}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}复制代码

replies.author: aa0307bb
replies.txt_content: LZ可以简单说说这里的原理吗{:10_492:}

aa0307bb 发表于 2015-7-6 22:25
LZ可以简单说说这里的原理吗
原理非常简单，就是如果探测到一个叫TNT的小黑的话就召唤一个易燃的有延迟的TNT，然后就将这个TNT5格内的所以非玩家生物TP到那个TNT那。
